name: Sewer Escape (Ambrose the Thinker)
description:
Your arm is firmly clenched by the guard. 

With a sudden release, you tumble down the stairs. 

The ooze and stench of the sewers is everywhere.

Foul creatures slither and skulk in the distance.

Only escape can save you now.
